channel.title: Queue Members on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Queue Members on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Building Queues with Asterisk
item.description: Wow it’s been a long time since I’ve update my blog. Well, lets do that! :) I’ve just posted some documentation to the Asterisk issue tracker for review. It’s about building queues with Asterisk. It is the start of probably 2 or 3 sets of documentation on building queues with Asterisk that I’ll be submitting. You can find the documentation here for now: https://issues.asterisk.org/view.php?id=16237 This documentation will likely be merged into core Asterisk at some point in the near future (doc/ subdirectory of your Asterisk source) and likely posted on http://blogs.asterisk.org as well.
